name: Nilloy New Sun
overview:
Nilloy New Sun Technologies was established in 1999 and started its business as a manufacturer, supplier, importer and exporter of a comprehensive range of Solar Steam Generation System, Solar Pool Heating System.

Our Product Range : a comprehensive range of Solar Steam Generation System, Solar Pool Heating System, Solar Cooking System, Solar Hot Water System, Solar Street Lighting System, Solar Hybrid Plant, Solar Photovoltaic Plant, Solar Power Plant and Solar Wind Hybrid Plant.

Certification & Membership: Certification Name:Registration Certificate Certification Type:Certificate of Registration Certification Name:NSIC Certification Certification Type:NSIC Certification Certification Name:Certificate of Registration Certification Type:Certificate of Registration

Memberships / Affiliations: Our ethical business practices, transparent dealings and quality that we offer in our range are some vital factors, which make us prominent in the industry and helped us in achieving the certification of ISO 9001:2000.

Why Us?: Nilloy Newsun Technologies believes in providing its customers with the best output products. We undertake all necessary care and follow all the quality norms to derive finest quality products. These products are fabricated with great care and are trusted upon by our different clients for their efficient and lasting functioning.

Infrastructure: Spread across an extensive area of 6000 sq ft, our company has established a hi-tech infrastructure. It is well-equipped with most recent and advanced amenities, which helps us in offering vast range in best possible manner.

Our Quality: Our company believes quality is the only factor that helps to sustain competition of industry. Stringent quality measures are taken by us, which are as per the standards of industry. Our complete product range is manufactured using high grade material, sourced from the reliable vendors of industry.
